body:
> formState is wrapped with a [Proxy](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Proxy) to improve render performance and skip extra logic if specific state is not subscribed to. Therefore make sure you invoke or read it before a render in order to enable the state update.

https://react-hook-form.com/docs/useform/formstate

thanks for the issue report, I am sorry to miss the previous issue replies. how come `isDirty` / `dirtyFields` are not subscribed?

Hi @bluebill1049! No need to be sorry, we appreciate your hard work :) I'm not sure I understand your question though. What do you mean by *not subscribed*? Does it mean we should only rely on the form state and get the field state from it?

I updated the sandbox to follow the documentation: https://react-hook-form.com/docs/useform/getfieldstate

It seems `isDirty` is not updated, only `isTouched` is.
Note: It seems it only happens when providing `values` to `useForm`

> Note: It seems it only happens when providing `values` to `useForm`

I see, will take a look at this weekend. 

> thanks for the issue report, I am sorry to miss the previous issue replies. how come isDirty / dirtyFields are not subscribed?

this is what I mean, `formState: { isDirty }` by deconstruct the props, we can detect you are subscribed to `isDirty` and hence will enable the dirty computation and re-render

I have found the same issue, if you just access the isDirty state through `form.formState.isDirty` or at times access is by `formState: { isDirty, errors },` and you don't subscribe to it, it won't set it to dirty which stops my validation to check if we should submit or not.
Simple fix is to just subscribe to it but not sure why it doesn't get set properly
Unfortunately, I do subscribe to `isDirty` from the `formState` in my codesandbox and it doesn't fix the issue

Chiming in to confirm this in my team's project as well. @djhi's sandbox & description encapsulates the issue perfectly.

If it helps for debugging, we went back to `v7.51.5` & the issue was not present.

Thanks for maintaining such a useful library!

issue.body:

Snyk has created this PR to upgrade react-hook-form from 7.34.2 to 7.52.1.

:information_source: Keep your dependencies up-to-date. This makes it easier to fix existing vulnerabilities and to more quickly identify and fix newly disclosed vulnerabilities when they affect your project.
- The recommended version is **81 versions** ahead of your current version. - The recommended version was released on **22 days ago**.
Release notes
Package name: react-hook-form
  • 7.52.1 - 2024-07-02

    üêû fix #12024 dirty not update issue with values prop (#12041)

    thanks to @ JardelCheung

  • 7.52.0 - 2024-06-15

    ‚öõÔ∏è close #11932 enable react 19 peer dependency (#11935)
    üëÆ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è close #11954 getFieldState remove unnessaried inValidating and touched subscription (#11995)
    üêû fix #11985 logic createFormControl check field before usage (#11986)
    ‚å®Ô∏è fix: enforce type safety for deps property in RegisterOptions (#11969)
    üêû fix #11922 keep dirty on reset with dirty fields (#11958)
    üöî close #11937 add validation in the cleanup process in useController (#11938)
    Revert "‚å®Ô∏è close: correct type of error field in getFieldState return object (#11831)"
    üìñ fix: change info.values type in WatchObserver (#11917)

    thanks to @ nakaakist, @ IdoBouskila, @ pincy and @ peinguin

  • 7.51.5 - 2024-05-21

    üìñ fix broken link to examples in README.md (#11805)
    ‚å®Ô∏è close: correct type of error field in getFieldState return object (#11831)
    üêû fix #11842 radio buttons not disabled when multiple share a name (#11873)
    üêû fix #11821 set value with disabled false before mount (#11880)
    üêû fix setError to preserve existing errors elsewhere in the object (#11888)
    ‚å®Ô∏è fix: add info.value type to WatchObserver (#11872)
    ü´° fix issue with internal set api (#11915)

    thanks to @ mjr2595 @ erashu212 @ SimonJTurner and @ peinguin

  • 7.51.4 - 2024-05-04

    üëπ close #11778 improve unregister omit key with getValues method (#11779)
    üêû fix #11794 issue: Fields dirty state is not updated when passing values to useForm

  • 7.51.3 - 2024-04-11

    üêû fix #11773 regression on dirty check with reset (#11775)

  • 7.51.2 - 2024-03-26

    üêû fix #11719 validation stuck on true state (#11723)

  • 7.51.1 - 2024-03-17

    üêõ bug(validatingFields, trigger): handle all fields validation trigger (#11624)
    üíö ci: cleanup actions versions (#11629)
    üêû fix #11590 issue with trigger on validatingFields (#11613)

    thanks to @ Moshyfawn

  • 7.51.0 - 2024-03-01

    üí¨ add isValidating and validatingFields to field state (#10657)

    const { formState: { validatingFields } } = useForm({ mode: 'onBlur' });

    ‚å®Ô∏è chore: replace ts-ignore with ts-expect-error (#11573)
    üßó‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è chore: update lib dev deps (#11548)
    üíÖ related #11541 improve dirty check when undefined provided with reset api
    üòæ fix #11514 issue under strict mode reset invoke twice reset mounted field names with keepDirtyValues (#11546)
    ü§° fix flush root render hack (#11521)
    üßΩ chore: removed unused utils and resp. test cases (#11476)
    üêû close #11503 issue dirty field update with async validation (#11509)

    Revert "üîß fix data param in handleSubmit when TTransformedValues is a union type (#11420)"
    Revert "‚ú® feat(values): priorities values over defaultvalues (#11399)" (#11545)

    ‚ù§Ô∏è Thanks to @ deepgolani4, @ pbankonier and @ deepgolani4

  • 7.50.0 - 2024-02-01

    üîß fix data param in handleSubmit when TTransformedValues is a union type (#11420)
    üë∑ build(Engines): remove pnpm dependency (#11425)
    üêû fixes #11386 get new dirtyFields when reset keeping defaults and dirty values (#11401)
    üè∑Ô∏è improve CustomElement type (#11309)
    üí´ feat(useForm): leave formState flags in a consistent state when throwing in handleSubmit onValid (#11214)
    ‚å®Ô∏è fix: change DeepPartial to account for object union types & unknown (#11385)
    ‚ú® feat(values): priorities values over defaultvalues (#11399)
    üêû close #11246 skip root validation on action when mode and revalidate mode is onSubmit (#11395)
    üí© fix #11322 trigger extra re-render with useWatch plus shouldUnregister (#11394)

issue.title: [Snyk] Upgrade react-hook-form from 7.43.6 to 7.52.1
issue.body:
This PR was automatically created by Snyk using the credentials of a real user.


![snyk-top-banner](https://github.com/andygongea/OWASP-Benchmark/assets/818805/c518c423-16fe-447e-b67f-ad5a49b5d123)

Snyk has created this PR to upgrade react-hook-form from 7.43.6 to 7.52.1.

:information_source: Keep your dependencies up-to-date. This makes it easier to fix existing vulnerabilities and to more quickly identify and fix newly disclosed vulnerabilities when they affect your project.
- The recommended version is **45 versions** ahead of your current version. - The recommended version was released on **23 days ago**.
Release notes
